body:
Inner Join IT06_Stoklar_MamulKumas SMK On SMK.UrunTID = PRM.CikanUrunTID
        Inner Join IT06_Stoklar_HamKumas SHK On SHK.UrunTID = SMK.HamKumasUrunTID
        Inner Join IT06_Stoklar S On S.UrunTID = SHK.HamKumasUrunTID
        Inner Join IT01_Firmalar F On F.FirmaID = S.FirmaID
        Inner Join IT01_KumasKaliteAdlari KKA On KKA.KumasKaliteID = SMK.KumasKaliteID
        Inner Join IT01_Renkler R On R.RenkID = SMK.RenkID
        Inner Join IT01_BaskiDesenVaryant BDV On BDV.BaskiDesenVaryantID = SMK.BaskiDesenVaryantID
